answer:
There is no provincial influenza consent form, with the exception of the form for adults incapable of giving consent. If you have further questions regarding this, please contact your local health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no provincial influenza consent form, with the exception of the form for adults incapable of giving consent.


## If you have further questions regarding this, please contact your local health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse.

Immunization Nurse
